sect1.title: Overview
sect1.para: The contents of a &gnum; file describe all of the elements which can be changed by the user. This sections examines all of the workbook contents which are not part of the worksheets.
This chapter has not yet been written.

sect1.title: Document Summary
sect1.para: A small amount of metadata is associated with each document. These metadata describe the author of the document and other related information.

sect2.title: Document Autosave Settings
sect2.para: The AutoSave tool can save your workbook automatically at specific intervals. You can specify how often you want your work to be saved by entering a number in the ``Minutes'' box. If you check the ``Prompt before saving'' button on, Gnumeric asks a confirmation before each automatic save.
